dictionary.definition: Any object used to obstruct a person's breathing or to prevent them from talking, especially during sex. A common sex toy in BDSM play.
Most often refers to a partner choking during fellatio and deep throating.
1. When a man unexpectedly forces his penis into his partner's throat during fellatio. 2. An unexpectedly large penis.
The involuntary reaction by throat muscles to expel anything lodged in the wind pipe. In terms of sex, this is often activated during rough fellatio.
A fat fetish in which pleasure is derived from the idea of oneself, or another, gaining weight. Related to: feederism, feeding, feedism, inflation, immobility, padding.
Respectful behavior or manners exhibited by men toward women.
An orgy in which multiple men have sex with one woman.
A young, boyish homosexual man. Origins: In Greek mythology, Ganymede was kidnapped by Zeus to be a sex slave for the Gods.
An ability to distinguish homosexuals from heterosexuals.
A person who infects others with HIV.
“Grandma I’d like to fuck.” A category in porn.
A hole in the wall of a bathroom stall through which men stick their dicks to receive anonymous fellatio.
A manic sexual desire for women. Synonyms: satyriasis.
